name: Shooting Star
description: After your characters use a Skill: Gain 1 Night Star. If you have at least 4 Night Stars, you can consume 4 Night Stars to deal 1 Cryo DMG. After this, this effect's DMG +1.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Star</color>. If you have at least 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>, you can consume 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color> to deal 1 $[K151]. After this, this effect's DMG +1.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Star</color>. If you have at least 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color>, you can consume 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Stars</color> to deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. After this, this effect's DMG +1.
